author.name: Licensed by Woolworths - ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: This spicy pasta dish made with store cupboard ingredients is popular all over Italy. Serve it with a simple spinach salad and some crusty bread for a quick supper.
name: Spaghetti Puttanesca with Spinach Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 fresh red chilli, deseeded and finely chopped
6 anchovies, canned, drained and finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a saucepan, add the garlic and chilli, and cook gently for 2 minutes, or until the garlic is slightly coloured. Add the anchovies, olives, capers, and tomatoes. Stir, breaking down the anchovies to paste.
Reduce the heat and simmer, uncovered, for 10-15 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened, stirring frequently.
Cook the spaghetti in plenty of lightly salted boiling water for 10 minutes until al dente, or according to the packet instructions. Drain.
Toss the spaghetti with the sauce, and serve sprinkled with parsley and parmesan cheese.
